product_name: Amazon Fresh Brand, Red Potatoes, 5 Lb
description:
5-pound bag of red potatoes

No preservatives

Grown in the United States

Good for roasting, pan-frying, and smashing

Our Fresh brand products are all about high-quality food that fits every budget, every day.

An Amazon Brand
latest_reviews: Mashed potatoes, fried potatoes, Potato Salad. These fresh tasting potatoes make the best tasting whatever you want to make with them. They are all nice looking, not bruised or soft spots on them and no sprouting either. And no cut spots on them, every potato looks good, and fresh. I have bought several bags of these potatoes and will coninue to do so as they are top quality.
Perfect, high quality and will purchase again
I prefer the red potatoes; $3.99 for 5 lbs. was a very reasonable price.
Perfect size. Deep rich color. Very tasty.
